definitions.definition: a small printed piece of paper that entitles the holder to a discount or that may be exchanged for goods or services.
examples: coupon, token, ticket, license, permit, pass; Morechit, slip, stub; informalducat, comp "present your voucher to the attendant at the front door"Morechit, slip, stub; ducat, comp present your voucher to the attendant at the front door
